avl.create_index_query: FT.CREATE idx:avl ON JSON SCHEMA $.timestamp AS timestamp NUMERIC SORTABLE $.company_id AS company_id TEXT $.trip_ids AS trip_ids TEXT $.route_ids AS route_ids TEXT $.agency_ids AS agency_ids TEXT $.feed_type AS feed_type TAG
